Articles.Content:
As some of the contracts have very specific requirements, I would like to copy them to an open text document on my secondary monitor. It gives more information at a glance than the already cluttered ingame interface interface. However, it is not possible to copy/paste the text of a contract and alt-tab. Is there a way of getting the info without having to write everything manually (yeah, I am lazy that way).

Thanks in advance.

Don't know if you know but there is a button to bring up ongoing contracts

http://imgur.com/KexkdSp
